title: how can i get RP for drawing

replies.body: We might be able to help if you're trying to get a small amount of RP...maybe.  :D  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll see what we can do.  :D
